name: Unstable Outcome
description:
Your mobile armor is losing power rapidly and you only have three choices left to make: divert power to weapons and take out as many enemies as possible before you die, divert power to the core and go out in a blaze of glory, or divert power to life support and live to fight another day. Each choice may present more than one outcome. Careful though, the outcome of your choice won't always be what you expect...

Maybe perhaps you should try something more than once...

Gameplay:

Mouse movement and click to make an option
